import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { BiLogOut } from 'react-icons/bi' import { GoTrophy } from 'react-icons/go' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { googleLogout } from '@react-oauth/google'; import "./Auth.css" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { setcurrentuser } from '../../action/currentuser.js'; const Auth = ({ user, setauthbtn, seteditcreatechanelbtn, points }) => { const [pts, setpts] = useState(user?.result.points) console.log(pts) const dispatch = useDispatch() const logout = () => { dispatch(setcurrentuser(null)) localStorage.clear() googleLogout() } return (
setauthbtn(false)}>

{user?.result.name ? ( <>{user?.result.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()} ) : ( <>{user?.result.email.charAt(0).toUpperCase()} )}

{user?.result.email}

{user?.result.name ? ( <> { Your Channel } ) : ( <> seteditcreatechanelbtn(true)} /> )}

User Points = {points}

logout()}> Log Out
) } export default Auth
